text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct version 2021
    CodeDisplay
    449418000Follicular non-Hodgkin's lymphoma of testis (disorder)
    448465000Diffuse non-Hodgkin's lymphoma of testis (disorder)
    702406000Sex cord stromal tumor of testis (disorder)
    94087009Primary malignant neoplasm of testis (disorder)
    254912000Regressed malignant testicular tumor (disorder)
    448387008Non-Hodgkin's lymphoma of testis (disorder)
    363449006Malignant tumor of testis (disorder)
    109876001Primary malignant neoplasm of descended testis (disorder)
    188235006Malignant tumor of tunica vaginalis (disorder)
    278055006Malignant Leydig cell tumor of testis (disorder)
    702405001Malignant granulosa cell tumor of testis (disorder)
    700488005Malignant sex cord tumor of testis (disorder)
    432131000124100Malignant mesothelioma of the tunica vaginalis (disorder)
    895361003Primary malignant neoplasm of bilateral testes (disorder)
    126900000Neoplasm of testis (disorder)
    188220005Malignant tumor of ectopic testis (disorder)
    92764008Carcinoma in situ of testis (disorder)
    895358004Primary malignant neoplasm of left testis (disorder)
    280116003Tumor of tunica vaginalis (disorder)
    895359007Primary malignant neoplasm of right testis (disorder)
    277664004Malignant lymphoma of testis (disorder)
  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-cm version 2022
    CodeDisplay
    C62.12Malignant neoplasm of descended left testis
    C62.11Malignant neoplasm of descended right testis
    C62.1Malignant neoplasm of descended testis
    C62.9Malignant neoplasm of testis, unspecified whether descended or undescended
    C62.0Malignant neoplasm of undescended testis
    C62.01Malignant neoplasm of undescended right testis
    D07.69Carcinoma in situ of other male genital organs
    C62.90Malignant neoplasm of unspecified testis, unspecified whether descended or undescended
    C62.02Malignant neoplasm of undescended left testis
    C62.10Malignant neoplasm of unspecified descended testis
    C62.00Malignant neoplasm of unspecified undescended testis
    C62.92Malignant neoplasm of left testis, unspecified whether descended or undescended
    C62Malignant neoplasm of testis
    C62.91Malignant neoplasm of right testis, unspecified whether descended or undescended

name: TesticularCancerCombined
title: Testicular Cancer Combined
description: This valueset contains the diagnosis codes for testicular cancer and diseases that are clinically treated as testicular cancer. It contains both ICD-10 and SNOMED.
